dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Insecticides; Pupacides; Herbicides; Nematocides; Weed Killers; Plant Growth Regulators; Insect Growth Regulators; Rodenticides; Fungicides; Acaricides,所有农药品种
Insecticides; Pupacides; Herbicides; Nematocides; Weed Killers; Plant Growth Regulators; Insect Growth Regulators; Rodenticides; Fungicides; Acaricides,所有农药品种
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Pesticides can be classified by their main uses, such as insecticides, pupacides, herbicides, nematocides, weed killers, plant growth regulators, insect growth regulators, and rodenticides. They can also be classified by their chemical structure into inorganic and organic pesticides. Examples of plant-based pesticides include nicotine, strychnine, veratrine, and rotenone. Microbial pesticides include agricultural antibiotics and live microbial pesticides. Other types of pesticides include fungicides, which control or kill bacteria, fungi, and algae in water systems, and acaricides, used for pest control.
农药可以按照其主要用途进行分类，例如杀虫剂、杀蛹剂、除草剂、杀线虫剂、除草剂、植物生长调节剂、昆虫生长调节剂和杀鼠剂。它们也可以按照其化学结构分为无机和有机农药。植物源农药的例子包括尼古丁、士的宁、马钱子碱和鱼藤酮。微生物农药包括农用抗生素和活性微生物农药。其他类型的农药包括杀菌剂，用于控制或杀死水系统中的细菌、真菌和藻类，以及杀螨剂，用于害虫控制。
